title: The Roman actor A tragædie. As it hath diuers times beene, with good allowance acted, at the private play-house in the Black-Friers, by the Kings Majesties Servants. Written by Philip Massinger.
author: Massinger, Philip, 1583-1640.
publisher: Printed by B[ernard] A[lsop] and T[homas] F[awcet] for Robert Allot, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Beare in Pauls Church-yard,
notes: Variant: texts of H3v and H4r interchanged.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
